prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Bass, Strings, Drums, Guitar, Piano, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Piano, Guitar, Bass, Drums, Strings, and Synth Pad, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Guitar, Bass, Drums, Strings, and Synth Pad, omitting Pipe.

Style 3:
This piece is made up of Piano, Guitar, Bass, Drums, Strings, and Synth Pad, Pipe excluded.
